original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields steady at open
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s treasury bond yields were steady at open on Monday, dealers said.
A 01.07.2025 bond was quoted at 26.90/27.10 percent on Monday, steady from 26.45/27.00 percent on Thursday.
A 15.09.2027 bond was quoted at 25.30/75 percent, steady from 25.40/70 percent on Thursday.
A 6-month maturing treasury bond was quoted at 23.30/24.00 (Colombo/ April 10/2023)
